caption: The filet mignon was the best out of all the meats served. The salad bar is pretty decent, although 2 of the lettuce varieties were old and wilted. This place is clean and has a really nice romantic ambience.  But I give them 2 stars …
Attended a wedding there. The food was awesome!!!

Excellent experience.  Staff was outstanding - could not have been better. Salad bar was very good - not on par with Chima but very close. Most of the meat was very good.  It was all nice and hot too. Drinks were great.  Tried the Mojito …
Over priced due to location.
Such an amazing experience! The staff catered to every need. & Really made the night special! Food was amazing and piping hot. And the options are endless 😍  Salina Kai
Wonderful ambiance, Wonderful staff, wonderful food, even the price was wonderful.  I love this place!  Sorry I forgot to take pictures of the food but you won't be disappointed.
This place was awesome lots of perfectly cooked beef. The picanha was on point. one of the better Brazilian steakhouses I've ever been to.

Excellent food awesome service

Delicious food, the leg of lamb and the lamb chops is AMAZING. The house steak with thwir signature seasoning is incredible. Delicious DRINKS. When the bartender bring out their signature Brazilian shots, you have to get a shot! Please save room for their Key Lime pie!  The prices are reasonable.

Was fantastic! Until.. the end. Very kind staff, very attentive towards those coming in to eat. Delicious food as well. But the killer is the cost, for me and my girlfriend. The bill was $150. I had only water as well as no alcohol either. …

Love Love Love ❤❤... The steak was my favorite.
Expensive,  but staff was attentive and food was good
The people here are wonderful, great to talk to. you won't be disappointed by the food,it's very flavorful.

Estampa can give Chima a run for its money especially when it comes to service.  They remember us every time we visit which is a nice touch.  And the restaurant being a smaller space means they are more attentive and can rotate the meat selection quicker.  Will definitely continue to patronize this place.

I do not recommend, over priced for the quality of the food, their buffet its a joke very fill itens you can call "brazilian" completely tasteless seems to me and my family we went there wnen the cook was on his day off! Not a good birthday choice for me.

Great Food Great Drinks !! Excellent service!
Average at best. Anybody that says this place is as good as Chima is outta there minds! No comparison on any level. 3rd place behind Brazz even...

Had my birthday here and it was great.

I’ve been to all the Brazilian steakhouses in Charlotte. This is hands down the best. The owner remembers you by name. The service can’t be beat. Most Brazilian Steakhouses serve what they have left remaining at the end of the night. Here, …
Food was delicious, pricing is totally reasonable since it’s all you can eat! Service was so friendly and awesome. Love it! Definitely a staple every time we come back to Charlotte. It’s a must!
Wonderful service
Great service .. wonderful hostess. Food was amazing . Very relaxing romantic environment . Went here for 27th birthday on a whim and couldn’t have picked a classier spot . Loved it !
Food was good.  Service was great.

This place is the most fantastic place in Charlotte. Every staff is so kind and friendly. Today is my son's birthday, and they provided a small cake with a candle after dinner. It was so touched. The picania is the best that I've ever tried. I strongly recommend this place. I will visit again definitely. I absolutely like here.
Great food, the meat is amazing. 🤤🤤🤤

It was good. Great Waiters, Good Food, Good Drinks!
Great Brazilian steak house. Great meat options and super friendly staff!
Service and hospitality A-1. Very attentive.

Top notch service and quality.
An amazing experience and the food was delicious, drinks were also good and the staff was very friendly.
Place is great, food is awesome. staff very friendly. Picanha is sooo goood.

So nice and the music was great the vibe was amazing the service was AMAZING definitely recommend!
Absolutely delicious!  Impeccable service, everyone went above and beyond.  Very safe and clean.
This was a great experience! My wife and I celebrate our Anniversary eating dinner here. We enjoyed everything. Service, atmosphere and food was terrific!!.
Very good, very attentive and sweet staff. Food was wonderful
Our experience was superb. They systematically have it all together with professionalism and cater to detail.
A variety of delicious and juicy meats, the picanha is awesome. Friendly staff.

First of all they had the masks/separation etc down pat so we could relax and pay attention to the real reason we were there.  With open space and large window walls the vibe was city cool.  Staff was welcoming, friendly and knowledgeable. …
Amazing food and great staff. It was a delightful meal and wonderful menu. My family really enjoyed thier time. I can't wait to go back.
Fantastic! You don't want to miss this place.

We went here for our anniversary and the experience was amazing!! They gave us royal treatment and the food was over the top flavorful and the meat was tender. The best Brazilian restaurant in Charlotte 100%
Best service I ever had.The food was delicious. I highly recommend this place.
This is a very good place with great food  and drinks I love it 🤗
Awesome love this place

Amazing service and amazing food. Would recommend to anyone looking for an authentic, classy Brazilian steakhouse experience. Could not have been more pleased with our wait staff. Felt like I was the only person in the restaurant. This place rocks!

The staff was extra pleasant and the variety of meats were delicious. The quality of the beans and rice and the salad bar options could have been better, but overall I enjoyed my meal. I left with a full stomach.

Great place. Awesome food and service. Employees & management are very attentive, they pay attention to every last detail.

It was amazing! Great food, outstanding staff! Salad bar is huge and don't flip the card unless you are ready for meat! They are not stingy and the selection is plentiful. Looking forward to our next visit!
Great place, amazing service and people!

Absolutely wonderful!  The food is amazing! As well as the service. We felt welcomed & completely catered to. If your even considering Ruth Chris, Don't!! Come here! It's a much better experience.  We will definitely be coming back every chance we get. Thanks for a great evening!
Great atmosphere, nice wine selections and of course you can't go wrong with a Rodizio! My wife enjoyed it also.
Absolutely fab. The staff were very attentive and helpful.  A perfect example of Brazilian dining.
Great place. The staff were friendly. Food was good. I would go back. Enjoyed myself.
Bring your appetite.  All of the food was seasoned well. Attentive wait staff.  Enjoyable evening.

Brazilian steakhouse house concepts have been great. This one is also nice. Service is fantastic. The food was really good with a diverse salad bar. The meats were plentiful and cooked well. Worth a try when in Charlotte.
Everything was great friendly servers
Whatever you want - bacon wrapped chicken, beef, sausage, pork... all served to your table steaming hot. And its all you can eat! You just cant beat that! Amazing place! Will be back for sure!

This is an awesome place to have date night or just a place to have a nice dinner. Took my wife for date night and had an amazing experience. The food is delicious, the service was top notch. I highly recommend you book your date night here with your loved one.
Excellent service, excellent meat selections, nice atmosphere, loved the salad bar plenty of options, extensive wine selection. Overall great experience.
Slow service. Decent food, not great and limited selection.

Awesome food great service definitely coming back well worth the money!!!

This is our first time here as we have been a very long time Chima customers but now we have a new favorite Brazilian spot! Diego and Lobo were fantastic!! Highly recommend for the food and the service.

Excellent meat choices & excellent service.
Best service ever, The gauchos service was really professional and the wines they have plenty option.
Amazing food. Incredible service. The staff was so friendly and attentive and the food was beyond great!

Excellent service, great tasting food. Salad bar has a lot of delicious selections. Highly recommended!
So good! Love their salads, not to mention the meats! Very inviting place and  the best customer service. I used to go to Chima but I’ve found my new favorite restaurant!
